title: New release – Nervatica
content:
Language is a must,  
 please clean your book’s dust.

If you move like a snail,  
 you'll never end up on Yale.

Teach your mind to rewind,  
 never leave knowledge behind,  
 what should be defined,  
 is what you'll get as assigned.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414184910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1Nervatica_Poster1_3912.png)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414184910im_/http:/typophile.com/files/1Nervatica_Poster2_4637.png)
